## IViewWin32Props.accessibilityAnnotation property

Tells a person using a screen reader what kind of annotation they have selected. If available, it will also tell a person the author of the annotation and the date and time the annotation was posted.

Note: If typeID is 'Unknown', a typeName must be provided.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
accessibilityAnnotation?: AccessibilityAnnotationInfo;
```
